casebody.data:
KEYSPAN GAS EAST CORPORATION, Appellant,
v.
MUNICH REINSURANCE AMERICA, INC., et al., Defendants, Century Indemnity Company, Respondent. Motion No: 2018-44 Court of Appeals of New York. Decided on January 11, 2018 Chief Judge DiFiore and Judge Garcia took no part.

***1054Motion by WRG Asbestos PI Trust for leave to file a brief amicus curiae on the appeal herein granted and the proposed brief is accepted as filed. The brief must be submitted in digital format within seven days.
